TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IKeyManager implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: This is the interface to implement in order to mark a class as a JSSE key managers so that key managers can be easily grouped.

remarks.para: This is the interface to implement in order to mark a class as a JSSE key managers so that key managers can be easily grouped. The key managers are responsible for handling the keys used to authenticate the local side to its peer,
